title: MAVIS
description: Adding long read support to MAVIS (Merging, Annotation, Validation, and Illustration of Structural variants), enabling comprehensive structural variant analysis from Oxford Nanopore and PacBio sequencing data.

title: Ancillary Long Reads Analysis Support
description: Developing supplementary analysis tools and pipelines for long-read sequencing workflows, including quality control, visualization, and integration with existing bioinformatics infrastructure.

title: From Scratch Series
description: Implementing fundamental algorithms and data structures from scratch to deeply understand how they work. Coming soon.
